Matthew Ames is a Linux Systems Administrator in London.

Matthew also runs <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu-helpouts.org]]</nowiki>, a website and circle of Google Helpouts users who wish to help users get started with Ubuntu.

* IRC - SuperMatt on irc.freenode.net
* #ubuntu-uk
* #ubuntu-helpouts (moderator)
* #omg!-ubuntu! (moderator)
 
* Email - matthew@supermatt.net

* Launchpad - <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~supermatt]]</nowiki>
 
* Website and blog - <nowiki>[[http://www.supermatt.net]]</nowiki>

=== Contributions ===

* Active member of the Ubuntu UK community both on IRC and the Mailing Lists.
 
* Member of the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UKTeam|UK Loco Team]]</nowiki>
